mapper.select: SELECT G.WDATE, G.RENTALCOUNT, G.CONTENT, G.OPTIONS, G.PRICE, G.BRAND, G.CATEGORY, G.TITLE, G.IMAGENAME, G.ID, G.SEQ, T.ALIKED LIKED FROM GOODS G, (SELECT GSEQ, ALIKED FROM(SELECT GSEQ, NVL(AVG(LIKED),0) ALIKED FROM REVIEW GROUP BY GSEQ)) T WHERE 1=1 AND G.SEQ=T.GSEQ(+) AND ROWNUM <=12 ORDER BY WDATE DESC

SELECT SEQ, IMAGENAME, TITLE, CATEGORY, BRAND, OPTIONS, RENTALCOUNT, WDATE FROM (SELECT SEQ, IMAGENAME, TITLE, CATEGORY, BRAND, OPTIONS, RENTALCOUNT, WDATE FROM GOODS ORDER BY RENTALCOUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=12
